name: Ninja Frog Infinite Runner
description:
In a distant land, there once lived a wise and ancient frog named Hanzo. Hanzo was known throughout the land as the greatest ninja warrior ever to have lived, and he spent his days training tirelessly to hone his skills.

One day, Hanzo was approached by a group of young frog warriors who were eager to learn from him. Seeing their potential, Hanzo took them under his wing and began to teach them the ways of the ninja.

Over time, the young frogs became skilled warriors themselves, and Hanzo was proud of what he had accomplished. But he knew that there was still much more for them to learn.

So Hanzo devised a training regimen unlike any other. He placed fire lamps at various intervals throughout the land and tasked his students with jumping over them, testing their agility and speed.

(Yes, this text was generated by ChatGPT)

This is a simple infinite runner game. All art, music and sound effects are free and have no copyright.

Controls: Press space bar to jump!
